event.description: This catered event will be held at the church and include beef brisket, baked potato, vegetables and a dessert. The cost is $10 per person and tickets can be purchased from Mary Brestel, Colleen Taylor, Elaine Thornlimb or Diane Feltner. May Brestel can be contacted at 541-385-9687 with any questions.
event.name: Prime Timers (Senior Adults): Valentine's Lunch
event.summary:
This catered event will be held at the church and include beef brisket, baked potato, vegetables and a dessert.  

The cost is $10 per person and tickets can be purchased from Mary Brestel, Colleen Taylor, Elaine Thornlimb or Diane Feltner. 

May Brestel can be contacted at 541-385-9687 with any questions.
